item.title: Peeples, Timothy, Paula Rosinski, and Michael Strickland. 'Chronos and Kairos, Strategies and Tactics: The Case of Constructing Elon Universityâ€™s Professional Writing and Rhetoric Concentration.'
item.description: One Liner Present a heuristic based on Chronos and Kairos to examine the development of Elon’s writing concentration. Summary Use their experiences in the development of the program at Elon to walk through the questioning process that they underwent in the development of their concentration. These are questions that get at local context and needs. They recommend starting with this heuristic inventory to theorize a coherent program identity to then chart development pff of the pairs of perspectives on time: chronos and kairos.
